content: Be wary of two Supporter Monks lying in wait in opposite alcoves near the statue, as well as the patrolling monk on the nearby road.

The content is as follows:
Be wary of two Supporter Monks lying in wait in opposite alcoves near the statue, as well as the patrolling monk on the nearby road.
